column1: Smoque BBQ////I had been meaning to try Smoque but was terrified of the long lines that I heard about. If there's one thing that I don't like
column2: it's waiting for food when I'm hungry. I get grouchy
column5: we just don't need to see me when I'm too hungry. So once upon a saturday
column6: me and the bf woke up early to go and get BBQ. We got there around 11:45; no wait in line at all for us! I was excited! But I didn't know what to get. And there wasn't a combo platter
column7: OH NOES. I wanted to try everything.
